thread.title: These Are the Weirdest Things Society Accepts as Normal
thread.title_full: These Are the Weirdest Things Society Accepts as Normal

author: Abby Heugel
title: These Are the Weirdest Things Society Accepts as Normal
text:
Over 3 million people just like you 'Like' us Â» Like it? Share it! 102 Shares 
If you went back in time 100 years and told people that they would have the whole world at their fingertips through the use of technology, that people would spend hours taking pictures of themselves and their meals and posting them for everyone to see, etc. they would think you were nuts. They would probably be right, given the way social media is used these days. 
But there are dozens of things that society just accepts as normal now that when you think about it, are really just kind of creepy. Need proof? The people of Reddit shared the things that well, are kind of weird when you really think about them... 1
